installation.script:
#/bin/bash

set -o errexit
set -o pipefail

echo_info(){ echo -e "\033[0;32m$*\033[0m"; }
echo_error(){ echo -e "\033[0;31m$*\033[0m" >&2; }
echo_warning(){ echo -e "\033[0;33m$*\033[0m"; }

apt update -q
apt upgrade -yq
apt install -yq unzip xz-utils

if [ ! -f "/mnt/server/openttd-14.1-linux-generic-amd64.tar.xz" ]; then
echo_info "Downloading game server files"
curl -L "https://cdn.openttd.org/openttd-releases/14.1/openttd-14.1-linux-generic-amd64.tar.xz" -o "/mnt/server/openttd-14.1-linux-generic-amd64.tar.xz"
fi

echo_info "Extracting game server files"
tar xf "/mnt/server/openttd-14.1-linux-generic-amd64.tar.xz" -C "/mnt/server" --strip 1

if [ ! -f "/mnt/server/opengfx-7.1-all.zip" ]; then
echo_info "Downloading graphics set"
curl -L "https://cdn.openttd.org/opengfx-releases/7.1/opengfx-7.1-all.zip" -o "/mnt/server/opengfx-7.1-all.zip"
fi

echo_info "Extracting graphics sets"
unzip -o "/mnt/server/opengfx-7.1-all.zip" -d "/mnt/server"
tar xf "/mnt/server/opengfx-7.1.tar" -C "/mnt/server/baseset" --strip 1

echo_info "Getting ZPH configs"
cd /tmp
git clone https://github.com/zeropingheroes/game-servers.git

echo_info "Copying ZPH configs into place"
cp game-servers/OpenTTD/configs/* /mnt/server/
